column5: I'm thinking of doing a yakak trip down the grand.  was probably going to launch in Paris but for take out, is there any public access points down river around brantford?  probably just hail a cab back to the car so a short road access would be nice

There's a couple places along the way. Brant Park on the West side is probably the best place, or just before the dam a little further down. Special regs in effect on that stretch. If I had my choice - I'd launch at Glen Morris and get out at Paris. Sweet stretch, lots of spots to work.
